resources.string: Only send AERO or EGLD to this wallet address. Sending any other tokens may result in the loss of your deposit.
Set a unique username for this account
Protect your wallet by creating a six digit passcode. This will be used to unlock your Chartr account wallet on this device.
Please enter your 24 word secret phrase in the correct order
Enter the following words again in the order specified
Are you sure you want to proceed?
One or more of the words you entered did not match. Verify you entered the correct word for the positions listed.

Keep your phrase safe 

Your recovery phrase is the key to your wallet in case you forget your PIN. Blockchains do not have a "Reset Password" feature so if you lose your secret phrase you risk losing all your assets and other data associated with this account. 

Do not share your secret phrase with anyone. Keep it in a secure place where you can only access it. Chartr does not have access to it so we cannot reset it for you.
If you are ready to backup your recovery phrase proceed to the next screen
Please make sure you have written the words down in the correct order from 1–24, then press continue.
I verify I have written down my recovery phrase in the correct order from 1–24
Insecure PIN detected, please enter a more secure PIN.
PIN could not be validated please try again.

All data associated with your Chartr account is stored securely on the blockchain and linked to your crypto wallet. You can create a new one now, or if you created a Chartr wallet in the past you can import it and retrieve your existing account data.\n\n Maiar wallet import also supported!
You must select an account type before proceeding. If you are a pilot select Business, otherwise select Personal.

Enter a call sign for this account so other users can search for you. Only letters, numbers, underscores ("_"), and hyphens ("-") are allowed, must start with 3 letters, and must be 6 characters or longer.
The Chartr app will change the way you think when it comes to booking your next flight.
All contracts and exchanges will be processed directly on the blockchain, ensuring they are safe and secure.
Use the native $AERO coin to purchase and collect payments on the Chartr platform.
The Chartr app is a truly decentralized organization, ran and managed by pilot professionals from around the world.
Pay for your flight, or send AERO to another wallet.
Your account is still being processed, check back in a few minutes.
Are you sure you want to quit wallet setup?
Are you sure you want to leave?
If you leave you will have to start the recovery phrase process over with a new phrase, are you sure you want to leave?
Chartr would like access to your camera in order to scan QR codes. Press OK to proceed or Cancel to keep your current permission settings.
Chartr needs access to your camera in order to take a profile picture. Press OK to proceed or Cancel to keep your current permission settings.
Chartr needs access to your files in order to take a profile photo, or to choose an existing photo from your gallery. Press OK to proceed or Cancel to keep your current permission settings.
Chartr would like access to your location to find charter services near you.
An unknown error occurred while sending the transaction.
Verify you have enough EGLD to cover the small network fee for this operation.
Verify you have enough EGLD to cover the small network fee for saving your account data on the blockchain.
The username you entered is already in use
Fund your wallet with a small amount of $EGLD before proceeding. This is needed to cover the cost of the network fee for creating your Chartr account on the blockchain (~$0.10 USD).
A wallet is required before you can create an account
Location is disabled on your device
Your username cannot be changed later!
Account type cannot be changed later!
Username and Account Type are required
